mapper.select: SELECT 'active' AS type, CONCAT(p.name, ' - ', p.space_no) AS slotName, el.entry_time AS entryTime, TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, el.entry_time, NOW()) AS elapsedTime, IFNULL(pm.total_fee, 0) AS estimatedFee FROM entry_log el JOIN parking p ON el.parking_id = p.parking_id LEFT JOIN payment pm ON el.payment_id = pm.payment_id WHERE el.car_id = ( SELECT car_id FROM car WHERE member_id = #{memberId} LIMIT 1 ) AND el.status = 'IN' ORDER BY el.entry_time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT 'reserved' AS type, vehicle_number AS vehicleNumber, reservation_start AS reservationStart, reservation_end AS reservationEnd, status FROM reservation WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND status = 'RESERVED' ORDER BY reservation_start DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT DATE(el.entry_time) AS date, CONCAT(p.name, ' - ', p.space_no) AS slotName, TIME(el.entry_time) AS startTime, TIME(el.exit_time) AS endTime, SEC_TO_TIME(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, el.entry_time, el.exit_time)) AS duration, IFNULL(pm.total_fee, 0) AS fee, 'ì™„ë£Œ' AS status FROM entry_log el JOIN parking p ON el.parking_id = p.parking_id LEFT JOIN payment pm ON el.payment_id = pm.payment_id WHERE el.car_id IN ( SELECT car_id FROM car WHERE member_id = #{memberId} ) AND el.status = 'OUT' ORDER BY el.entry_time DESC LIMIT 10
